```{r load-packages}
# Load packages
pacman::p_load(
  tidyverse, # Data wrangling and visualisation
  skimr, # Skim data
  gtsummary, # Table summary
  rio, # Import and export dataset
  here, # File management
  janitor # Clean names
)
```

```{r import-dataset}
# Import dataset
df <- import(here("data","mortality_data.xlsx"), skip = 5)
```


```{r clean-names}
# Clean column names
df <- clean_names(df)
```

```{r de-identify-dataset}
df |> 
  select(-c(
    P
  ))
```
